author: Aris Folley
title: White House slams pastor leading Cabinet Bible studies for linking homosexuality, coronavirus
description: The White House on Thursday condemned comments by a pastor who appeared to suggest that homosexuality helped cause the coronavirus pandemic.Rev. Ralph Drollinger, who leads regular Bible study groups for top Trump...
content:
The White House on Thursday condemned comments by a pastor who appeared to suggest that homosexuality helped cause the coronavirus pandemic.
Rev. Ralph Drollinger, who leads regular Bible study groups for top Trump administration officials, made the remarks … [+3283 chars]
